import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from "react-router"; export default function Add (){ const [form, setForm] = useState({ fullName:"Sri Vira", gender:"male", birthDay:"1997/10/02", roleid:1, address:"No 480/2,Puhulyaya,Mahiyanganaya", mobile:767592100, email:"msriv1997@gmail.com", image:"image url", }); const navigate = useNavigate(); // These methods will update the state properties. function updateForm(value) { return setForm((prev) => { return { ...prev, ...value }; }); } // This function will handle the submission. async function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); // When a post request is sent to the create url, we'll add a new record to the database. const newMember = { ...form }; await fetch("http://localhost:4000//member/add", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(newMember), }) .catch(error => { window.alert(error); return; }); setForm({ name: "", position: "", level: "" }); navigate("/"); } return (

updateForm({ fullName: e.target.value })} />
